name: Binta <3
greetingText: Every moment with you is a treasure.
wishText: May our love story continue to unfold in the most magical ways!
text1: Today, the stars shine just for you.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to my one and only! You are my world.
text2: I had something simple in mind.
text5Content: You are the love of my life.
outroText: I hope this made your day as special as you are to me.
replayText: Or click here to relive this moment with me again.
